1_1GJc2vm4vJjAKsFoFJ2D3gGmKiRac2kfnz.body:
The first OS I ever used was lubuntu. I like lubuntu for the nostalgia, tho, it isn't the best. That was the OS that I learned on, though. Ubuntu is shit and just kept giving me problems, so, I keep landing on linux mint, and, yeah. I like it. It's very slick and gives me no real problems.

I suspect I would enjoy gentoo or slackware, but, I need a machine I can risk fucking up if I am going to compile an operating system
